property.name: Description
property.value: The dualsurfacemin is a C++ implementation of the fully automatic dual surface minimization (DSM) algorithm for the optimization of deformable surfaces [1]. The method is developed for automatic surface extraction from noisy volumetric images.

property.name: Description
property.value: After transcription of a gene, the resulting pre-mRNA is spliced before exiting the nucleus. Alternative splicing of a single pre-mRNA can give rise to different mRNA transcripts. Consequently, alternative splicing is an important mechanism for generating protein diversity from a single gene. It has been suggested that large numbers of human genes are alternatively spliced (1, 2, 3). Alternative splicing is observed all across metazoa, and has been implicated in various biological processes

property.name: Authors
property.value: Christopher Lee, Alexander Alekseyenko, Stott Parker, Zach Fierstadt

property.name: Keywords
property.value: alternative splicing, biological process, alternatively spliced isoforms
